divs: Sighting Detailsvery strange. looked like a stationary celestial object, an earth satellite. Like a super large weather balloon way out in earth's atmosphere. Very bright with sun reflection and then dimming as it set. Followed the path of the sun.
Summary: Looked kind of like a weather balloon with a smaller light flying around it. Obvious sun reflection. Appeared stationary in the sky following an hour behind the sun.
